articles.author: Kala Vijayaraghavan and Arindam Majumder
articles.title: Air India writes off Rs 7,000 crore in FY23, turns Ebitdar positive - Economic Times
articles.description: Air India, owned by Tata, wrote off an estimated INR7,000 crore ($927 million) in fiscal year 2023 as a result of impairments resulting from faulty aircraft and engines, as well as low-cost airline AirAsia's Indian arm, people familiar with the situation said…

articles.title: Kidney Cells Rejuvenation: A Novel Breakthrough - Asiana Times
